explanation: [0-0] In an amusement park shrouded in smoke, a young boy in a green shirt and blue shorts stands at the top of a slide, his hands on the railing. The white watermark "@fash" appears in the upper right corner of the screen.

[0-2] The boy then smiles and slides down the slide. Just as he's about to reach the bottom, he falls and lies on the ground. A woman in a yellow shirt and green pants crouches down to look at the boy, who turns his head and smiles at her.

[0-2] The boy then smiles and slides down the slide. Just as he's about to reach the bottom, he falls and lies on the ground. A woman in a yellow shirt and green pants crouches down to look at the boy, who turns his head and smiles at her.

[2-6] The camera then moves to the top of the slide, where a pink sheep is trembling with fear, its legs shaking as it grips the railing with both hands and looks down. Then, covering its eyes with both hands, it slides down the slide. Another white sheep stands at the bottom of the slide. The pink sheep opens its eyes after sliding down, and the white sheep gives it a thumbs-up with a smile. The pink sheep looks at the white sheep happily.
